title: The Phlunk
description: 'The Phlunk was born on a magical moon that sails between the stars, a strange little planet shaped like a spoon, between Venus, Saturn and Mars.' With his magic ears, the Phlunk can hear all the sounds made by earth's children, even from outer space! Come and discover a world where someone is always listening.Picture book 'The Phlunk' is perfect for children aged 2-7 years and perfect for storytime sessions in schools and libraries. It features beautiful organic illustrations and a gently rhythmic, upbeat poem.Buy your copy direct from the publisher Strata Books. Visit The Phlunk website to find out more.
author: Lou Rhodes
